      • importImage

        public static javax.swing.ImageIcon importImage()
                                         throws java.io.IOException
        Import a selected image to the program. Using this method png,jpg,gif,tft images can be imported.

        Returns:
        A ImageIcon imported image
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the selected file is not a valid image IO

      • importIImage

        public static javax.swing.ImageIcon importIImage(java.lang.String... extensions)
                                          throws java.io.IOException
        Import a selected image to the program. Extensions of the importing images can be given.

        Parameters:
        extensions - A String... extensions of the images.
        Returns:
        A ImageIcon imported image
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the selected file is not a valid image IO

                         throws java.io.IOException
        Save an image.

        Parameters:
        saveFile - A File location that the image should be saved.
